subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Carolina dropped to 6-7 with its third loss in a row and have to win out to finish 9-7 and hope that others struggle the rest of the way to sneak into a wild-card berth.
snippet: Carolina dropped to 6-7 with its third loss in a row and have to win out to finish 9-7 and hope that others struggle the rest of the way to sneak into a wild-card berth.
